credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline E. Greenleaf
title: Man's hat
medium:
Medium: linen and cotton ground, crewel wool, silk binding, silk and metallic thread tassel
Technique: wool embroidery using chain, buttonhole and stem stitches on plain weave with double faced texture created usisng 3-span floats; plain weave binding
description: Cap made of panels of undyed ribbed cotton with fairly deep cuff around brim, piped along four seams and along cuff-top with blue silk cloth; topped with silk and metal tassel.  Embroidered with bright crewels in chain stitch with symmetrical flower spray in each panel, floral scroll along cuff.  Unlined.
name: Man's hat
